SQLWhere.SQLWhere: (tblmain.DTENABLED<=@DTREFERENCE and isnull(tblmain.DTDISABLED,dateadd(day,1,@DTREFERENCE))>@DTREFERENCE) and ( (tblMain.ACTION is null) or ((';' || tblMain.ACTION || ';') like ('%;' || @IDPERMISSION1 || ';%')) <choose> <when test="{IDPERMISSION2}!='N/A'"> or ((';' || tblMain.ACTION || ';') like ('%;' || @IDPERMISSION2 || ';%')) </when> </choose> ) and (tblMain.IDSTBUSINESS=@IDSTBUSINESS or tblMain.IDSTBUSINESS is null) and %%DH:SQLInstrCriteria%%(tblmain,FEE) and %%DH:SQLContractCriteria%%(tblmain,FEE) and %%DH:SQLInstrUnlCriteria%%(tblmain,FEE) <choose> <when test="{ASSETCATEGORY}!='N/A'"> --[WI789] and ( (tblmain.ASSETCATEGORY is null) or (tblmain.ASSETCATEGORY = @ASSETCATEGORY) ) and ( (tblmain.ASSETCATEGORY is null) or ('_' || tblmain.ASSETCATEGORY ||'_' like '%[_]' || @ASSETCATEGORY || '[_]%') or ((tblmain.ASSETCATEGORY='Future') and (@ASSETCATEGORY like '%Future')) ) </when> <otherwise> and ( (tblmain.ASSETCATEGORY is null) ) </otherwise> </choose> <choose> <when test="{TRDTYPE}!='N/A'"> and ( (tblmain.TRDTYPE is null) or (tblmain.TRDTYPE = @TRDTYPE) ) </when> <otherwise> and ( (tblmain.TRDTYPE is null) ) </otherwise> </choose> <choose> <when test="{TRADABLETYPE}!='N/A'"> and ( (tblmain.TRADABLETYPE is null) or (tblmain.TRADABLETYPE = @TRADABLETYPE) ) </when> <otherwise> and ( (tblmain.TRADABLETYPE is null) ) </otherwise> </choose> and ( (tblmain.IDA is null) or (tblmain.IDA = @IDA_PAY) or (tblmain.IDA = @IDA_REC) )

SQLWhere.SQLJoin: inner join dbo.VW_FEESCHEDENV vw_env on (vw_env.IDFEESCHEDULE=tblmain.IDFEESCHEDULE) left outer join dbo.VW_FEESCHEDINSTR vw_ti2 on (vw_ti2.TYPEINSTR=tblmain.TYPEINSTR and vw_ti2.ID_=tblmain.IDINSTR) left outer join dbo.VW_FEESCHEDINSTR vw_tiu2 on (vw_tiu2.TYPEINSTR_UNL=tblmain.TYPEINSTR_UNL and vw_tiu2.ID_=tblmain.IDINSTR_UNL) left outer join dbo.VW_FEESCHEDCONTRACT vw_tc2 on (vw_tc2.TYPECONTRACT=tblmain.TYPECONTRACT and vw_tc2.ID_=tblmain.IDCONTRACT)

Condition.SQLWhere: ( (IDMENU='OTC_INP_TRD' or (IDMENU like 'OTC_INP_TRD_%' and IDMENU not in ('OTC_INP_TRD_RES','OTC_INP_TRD_BAR_TRG','OTC_INP_TRD_CSR','OTC_INP_TRD_SPLIT'))) and PERMISSION='Create' )
(TYPEINSTR='%%COLUMN_VALUE%%TYPEINSTR%%') and (GPRODUCT in ('*','%%COLUMN_VALUE%%GPRODUCT%%') or '%%COLUMN_VALUE%%GPRODUCT%%'='' or '%%COLUMN_VALUE%%GPRODUCT%%' is null)
